thread.section_title: Pelican Water Systems Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pelican Water Systems | pelicanwater.com
thread.title: Larry Schoonover
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by Larry Schoonover

author: Larry Schoonover
title: Larry Schoonover
text: This is the second pelican system I've owned and it's doing a great job , the first system was a whole house carbon and sediment system with a Trojan max uv bacteria light. It work great on my Tenn well water. My new system is the whole house cartridge system over here on the coast of North Carolina. House came with an iron filter so I added the sediment, carbon, and salt-free softener system . Great tasting clear water, no iron taste or smell , softner greatly reduced spots on dishes. Pelican has great prices and customer service is outstanding. Highly recommend !! Larry S.
